item.title: Government shutdown becomes 2nd longest in U.S. history

item.title: Brent crude jumps about 5% after Trump administration sanctions big Russian oil companies
item.description: The new sanctions are related to plans for a meeting between President Donald Trump and Russian leader Vladimir Putin being dropped.

item.title: Trump to demolish entire East Wing of White House for ballroom: 'Plans changed'
item.description: President Trump has said he and donors will cover the costs of the White House East Wing ballroom, but it is not clear who all the contributors are.

item.title: Trump says U.S. cattle ranchers 'don't understand' tariffs after some slam Argentine beef plan

item.title: Trump dined with Rupert Murdoch despite suing him for $10B over Epstein letter: Report
